Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards

Class CardGolden

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.CardResource
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.CardGolden
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CardGolden extends CardResource
Represents a golden card in the game, which extends the functionality of a resource card. Extends the CardResource class.
See Also:

      corners - The corners of the card.
      requiresCorner - Whether this card requires a corner to be placed.

    • countPoints

      public int countPoints(CardMap cardMap, Coordinates coordinates, boolean faceUp)
      Calculates the points of the card based on its placement and faceUp status. If the card is face up and requires a corner, multiplies the number of nearby corners by the points of the card. If the card is face up and requires a specific artifact, multiplies the number of available artifacts by the points of the card. Otherwise, returns the fixed points of the card.
      Overrides:
      countPoints in class CardResource
      Parameters:
      cardMap - The card map containing the card.
      coordinates - The coordinates of the card.
      faceUp - Whether the card is face up or not.
      Returns:
      The points of the card based on its placement and faceUp status.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Checks whether this CardGolden is equal to another object. Two CardGolden objects are considered equal if they have the same color, points, corners, requirement of a corner, required artifact, and constraint.
      Overrides:
      equals in class CardResource
      Parameters:
      o - The object to compare with this CardGolden.
      Returns:
      true if the objects are equal; false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Generates a hash code for the CardGolden object. The hash code is based on the color, points, corners, requirement of a corner, required artifact, and constraint of the card.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class CardResource
      Returns:
